reviewText: Odd Squad is my kids and MY favorite show on tv right now. We all look forward to it every day. My kids are constantly asking throughout the day, "How many more hours til Odd Squad comes on?" It's educational and they all have learned something from it. It's cute. I can't wait for my dvds to be released! We LOVE IT! My youngest daughter even dressed at 'Miss O' for Halloween and my middle daughter dressed up as an Odd Squad villian she made up.

My daughter is a huge fan of Odd Squad and when she received this from her Elf on a Shelf this season, it made her whole day! She has watched it endlessly and loves it as much now as she did the first day she received it.
My 5 year old son loves this show. It's actually a show I can watch as an adult and still enjoy it. The plots are fun and the characters are loveable.

Odd Squad is one of those great educational kids' shows that is as fun for parents as it is for kids.  Kids will love the sleuthing adventures and silliness, hardly realizing they're learning math along the way, and adults will appreciate the dry, tongue-in-cheek humor and occasional pop culture references.  Odd squad is often the go-to choice for my 7 1/2  4 1/2 year-olds, and I'm never sorry when I have time to watch with them.
My kids love Odd Squad so this movie was a hit
My son was so excited when he got this. He had no idea you could buy Odd Squad movies and seasons.
My 7 and 5 y/o sons love Odd Squad. These episodes are silly and funny.
Our son loves this TV show and the movie is cute too
My 3 year old son loves the show!  Brilliant way to present math concepts to its target audience of elementary schools children!
